title: Youtube language comparison
research_question: How do video results about substances change according to the language of the query?
description: Video results on YouTube vary depending on the language of the query. This page displays the top 50 videos for each query across different languages, merged together. Videos can be filtered by language and ordered by number of views, time, and like count.
protocol: Search term on YouTube (with language and country filter activated)
Collect the top 50 results for each query term using YouTube Data Tools
Delete unrelated results from the list
Compile results from different languages in one list per query
